    Security and Privacy

    Detail HapYak's Cloud Infrastructure, Application Data Security, User Authentication, and more.

    HapYak is trusted by the largest Enterprises, Brands, Universities and Organizations around the world. If you are undergoing a full Security and Privacy review on behalf of your organization click below and we'll email a Security and Privacy overview with full details.
